name: Staples Teacher Rewards
description: 20% off with teacher ID and app coupon
fullDescription: Staples offers teachers 20% off in-store purchases with app coupon and teacher ID, plus special back-to-school savings and rewards.
whatTheyOffer:
- 20% off in-store with app coupon and teacher ID
- Special teacher appreciation events
- Back-to-school supply deals
- Staples Rewards points on purchases
- Free shipping on orders $30+
howToGetIt:
1. Download Staples app
2. Find teacher discount coupon in app
3. Present coupon and teacher ID at checkout
4. K-12 teachers and administrators eligible
5. Check app for current offers
keywords: Staples, teacher discount, educator, 20% off, school supplies, office supplies, classroom
